link: Peter Kagey, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
Index entries for sequences related to coordinates of 2D curves
formula: To get a(n), write n as Sum b_j*2^j, then a(n) = Sum b_(2j)*2^j. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, Nov 13 2008
example: If n=27, then b_0=1, b_1=1, b_2=0, b_3=1, b_4=1. Therefore a(27) = b_0 + b_2*2 + b_4*2^2 = 5. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, Nov 13 2008
maple: f:= proc(n) local L; L:= convert(n,base,2); add(L[2*i+1]*2^i,i=0..floor((nops(L)-1)/2)) end;
